text: Motion
Motion
Motion

Okay, got it! We'll resume in 20 minutes,
so please take a break until then.

Sure,
I understand.
...Phew...

Mei, sorry. I have to step away for another matter
now, and you'll be in charge after this...
Okay, no problem at all~

I'm counting on you. But if anything comes up,
feel free to contact me right away.

Geez, you worry too much~
Am I really that unreliable~?

No, that's not what I meant at all...!
Sorry...!

Ahaha, my bad my bad.
I was being a little mean~

But, there are still parts where it's understandable
to think like that, right~?
Mei, you really don't need to think like that──

──It's okay.
I understand that better than anyone.

I'm not as amazing as Asahi-chan,
and I'm not as mindful as Fuyuko-chan.
So there's still room for improvement, right?
...Mei.

But you know, that means
the only way to go is up, right?
...Ah, exactly!

And when that happens,
please rely on me with all your might! Ahaha~
